page.title: 07FARM MACHINERY
page.content: The{combine harvester}is called a New Holland 44TW.It has a big cutting part which cuts up the wheat and inside it cuts off the top of the wheat and the stalks are thrown out of the back and you can see long piles of wheat stalks in rows.Then comes a{tractor}and trailer and at the side of the{combine {harvester}is a long metal thing with leather round where the corn comes out.When the{trailer}is level with the {harvester}the driver pulls a lever and the long metal thing comes out and the corn goes into the{trailer.}When the {trailer}is full the{tractor}takes it to the barn.When the driver gets there he tips the{trailer}so the corn comes out and is stored in this big store room and then the{tractor}does it all over again until they have finished the field.
